# YT Downloader Pro - Workspace Instructions

## Project Structure
- `backend/` - Python FastAPI server
- `flutter_app/` - Flutter Android application
- `docs/` - Documentation

## Development Setup

### Backend
```bash
cd backend
pip install -r requirements.txt
python main.py
```
RuleazÄƒ pe: http://localhost:8000

### Flutter App
```bash
cd flutter_app
flutter pub get
flutter run
```

## Deployment
- Backend: Railway.app
- Frontend: Google Play Store (later)
